channel.title: Let Sellsword disable DAY abilities
channel.description:
Really self-explanatory, there needs to be a STRONG counter to day confirms.
We asked for this long ago and were only given a 20-second silence.
This isn't good enough.
Plus, it's bugged at the moment on Invoker at least.

item.title: Let Sellsword disable DAY abilities
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
I see your point, but tbh Prince should just have normal immunity. It’s not good balance for a class to be immune to basically everything.

Solic:

Don’t think it should work on the Prince. That’s too powerful in my opinion.

I don’t see how it would be. Prince is too powerful at the moment as there’s no way to completely counter it other than Reaper, but Reaper games aren’t a guarantee(Plus reaper can’t win with the opposing faction.

Shrimpy:

Don’t let Butler have Bewilder, that allows him to confirm himself which kind of defeats the whole purpose

That’s why I added this:

They will not be notified until they attempt to use an ability. Still consumes the cost(souls/brilders)/use of the ability.

You can still confirm someone, but it’s harder and requires them to waste a use of an ability, which I don’t see people doing just to confirm someone else.

Shrimpy:

We only want evils to disable day abilities so that BD can’t say “Hunter, wolf someone” or “Mystic, telepathy” because as soon as they say that, they will (hopefully) get disabled.

I do see your point, but you should never use wolf(or any killing ability) to confirm yourself. There are way too many negative variables(think of how many occupiers/redirectors there are). I’m not against reducing it to one use to lower confirmability for Butler, but part of the reason why I want it is that Butler is honestly a bit boring.

item.title: Let Sellsword disable DAY abilities
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
/support

Here’s what the ability itself should look like:

Bewilder(Uses: 3 for servant, 2 for sellsword and Butler, and 1 for Invoker and Pretender) - Occupy your target for the rest of the day. Bypasses immunity. They will not be notified until they attempt to use an ability. Still consumes the cost(souls/brilders)/use of the ability.

  • This will be given to Butler, Servant, Invoker, and Pretender(would replace Distract for the last 2) as well. Uses vary

  • Would work on all day abilities, including ones that are selected during the day but actually occur at nightt

  • Would work on the prince
